Articles.Content:
Hello there. My name, or at least the name Steam knows me by, is SuperWeegee4000. I just got KSP through Steam and soon - with a little mass-broadcasted help from Scott Manley - Ronely Kerman became the first Kerbal to fly a rocket. (It seems Jebediah was busy when I brought out the Insert Name Here P1, aka a carbon copy of Scott Manley's introductory 1-stage rocket.) The mission was completed without incident and the capsule safely touched down within walking distance of the KSC, and at that point I figured I should make an account here, to share my experiences with the game. Now to fill out my account info....

Edited June 20, 2013 by SuperWeegee4000

Welcome to the forum

Good job recruit.

And ouch Super Weegee 4000... we will never find the underwear... Don't know if it means the same thing as where I'm from... but ouch.

Welcome to the forum

Good job recruit.

And ouch Super Weegee 4000... we will never find the underwear... Don't know if it means the same thing as where I'm from... but ouch.

...Okay?

Thanks?
